reviewText: The video takes you threw the Lakers run to the 1987 NBA Finals! This video includes Lakers summary threw the regular season. All-Star weekend. Playoffs. And NBA Finals Lakers vs Celtics with the lakers climbing on top 4-2. This video also shows a sense of Humor, They include segments of "Ugliest Car" (Billy Thompson). "Best Hair" (Pat Riley). "Beach Bum" (Kurt Rambiis). "Worst Shot" (Wes Matthews). "Best Singer" (Byron Scott woo woo). The lakers in the 1986-87 went 65-17 in the regular season and 15-3 in the postseason combining them with a 80-20 record. Watch Magic win his first MVP and Coop win DPOY. And how can we forget the trade of the year that saved the Lakers, Mychal Thompson. IMO the 1986-87 Lakers were the greatest team of all time. I don't think we will ever see another team like that again. 5 Stars All The Way!!!!!!!!

How can you top a video that features your favorite team, the ShowTime Lakers ripping through the NBA, including hated rival the Beantown Celtics, on their way to the 1987 Championship?  You can't...because this documentary features Byron Scott singing the "Woo Woo" song.  Put this one in the fridge, Chicky.
